'''Meleth''' was the nurse of [[Eärendel]], according to the early version of the [[legendarium]] in ''[[The Book of Lost Tales]]''. She took care of him during the first years of his life in [[Gondolin]]. She also told him tales about [[Melko]], which made him cry when the lights of the enemy appeared in his chamber during the [[Fall of Gondolin]].<ref>{{LT2|III}}, p. 174</ref> It is unknown if she survived with the [[Exiles of Gondolin|exiles]].

==Etymology==
''meleth'' is [[Gnomish]] for "love".<ref>{{LT1|Appendix}}, entry "Nessa"</ref>
